00017 {
00018         int Pos;
00019         int Size;

00026 typedef struct _tagSPECIAL
00027 {
00028         BOOL    bSpecial;       // is this infact a special row / col
00029         int             iMin;           // top or left of the data
00030         int             iMax;           // right or bottom of the data
00031         int             iAlignment;     // -1 left/top, 0 center, 1 right/bottom
00032         int             iDiff;          // difference between iMin and iMax
00033 } SPECIAL, * PSPECIAL;
